review_details: Όμορφος χώρος, άψογο σέρβις και υπέροχες γεύσεις. Σε συνδυασμό με τη θέα, είναι από τα καλύτερα σημεία.

I did this for third time. Every time is getting better. Vasilis and Antonis are great people, the food excellent and the whole experience very relaxing and you can learn a lot of things if you ask. I suggest to everyone. Definitely, if I come next year in Rhodes, I will do it again. Great job, thank you...
